Settings.Title: Settings
Settings.BluetoothConnectionError: To update the firmware, you need to connect to the device
Settings.BruAppWillDownload: The BRU app will download and install the latest firmware to your BRU machine. Please make sure you are connected to Wi Fi to avoid additional charges.

error.sendCommand: ❌ Something happened while sending command. Please try again later!
error.connection: ❌ Something happened while connecting to device. Please try again later!
error.disconnect: ❌ Something happened while disconnecting from device. Please try again!
error.read: ❌ Something happened while reading data from device. Please try again later!
error.pleaseConnect: Please connect to device before sending command
error.noConnectedDevice: There is no connected devices. Please connect to device and try again.

step1.text: This APP need access to bluetooth to be able search and communicate with BRU.

step2.text: We need access to your phone's bluetooth to be able search and communicate with BRU.

step3.text:
Bluetooth and Location permissions are required to find and control your nearby BRU device even when the app is not in use.
Without access things may not work as expected.

step4.text:
Please activate bluetooth on BRU device.

To do this go to Machine Setup => 'Bluetooth' -> 'On'

step6.text:
Cool! We found your BRU Machine!

Please activate pairing mode on BRU device.
To do this go to Machine Setup => 'Pair New Device'.

After this step you must see 'Waiting for connection' on BRU device display.

step7.text:
Now we are trying to connect to your BRU Machine.

Please wait a few seconds.

step8.text:
Please check your BRU Machine. You need to activate pairing mode on BRU device.
To do this go to Machine Setup => 'Pair New Device'.

After this step you must see 'Waiting for connection' on BRU device display.

step9.text:
Your BRU Machine is successfully paired with your phone.

Now you can use all features of BRU app

step10.header: We need to update your BRU firmware!

Help.title: Help
Help.contactDesc: Please provide the issue details to the BRU Support. We will assist you as soon as possible.
Help.modalSuccess: The request has been sent. We will contact you as soon as possible.
